text:
Herman Cain Remains Hospitalized 1 Month After COVID-19 Diagnosis

He went to 46-1’s #TulsaRally and refused to wear a mask.

I guess he caught a really bad case of the ‘hoax.’ https://t.co/lkfxvCH2oS
